title: Smartwool Men's Ski Targeted Cushion Over The Calf Socks
description: HIGH-PERFORMANCE SKI SOCK. Seize the ski day with ski socks that help you stay outside longer — naturally. These socks put cushioning and body-mapped mesh zones everywhere you need it for maximum comfort and breathability in any boot.

TARGETED CUSHION. Made with a light cushion in targeted areas like the toe and heel, these wool hiking socks for men and women help alleviate the potential for blisters and high impact when you're trekking.

OVER THE CALF SOCKS. Featuring a tall, over the calf crew fit that prevents chafing from your boots, these versatile socks can be worn throughout all seasons and are the perfect pair for high top hiking shoes or ski and snowboard boots.

WHY MERINO WOOL? Thinner and softer than regular wool, it's easy to wear next to skin. Each fiber transports sweat away as a vapor (we tested it ourselves) and regulates body temperature to keep you cool in summer and warm in winter.

FUNCTIONAL FEATURES. Go far, feel good with thoughtful tech to keep you skiing comfortably — our 4 Degree Elite Fit System delivers a dialed-in, performance-oriented fit while Indestructawool tech provides enhanced durability.
